name: Heatran
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

poke_power.name: Smelt
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a {M} Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Heatran. This power can’t be used if Heatran is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Heavy Metal
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each {M} Energy attached to Heatran. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.
